CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8)

SET(TRIANGLE_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CACHE PATH "Path to triangle library")

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DTRILIBRARY -DNO_TIMER)

ADD_LIBRARY(triangle
triangle.c
triangle.h
)

# set MS Visual Compiler flags
IF(WIN32)
  SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES( triangle PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "-fp:strict")
ENDIF(WIN32)
